channel.title: About The Thesis on CSE Thesis Musings
channel.description: Recent content in About The Thesis on CSE Thesis Musings

item.title: Course Outline
item.description: Course Aims The thesis provides an opportunity for you to bring together engineering principles learned over the previous years of study, and apply these principles to innovatively solve problems such as the development of a specific design and/or the investigation of a hypothesis. Thesis projects are complex, open-ended problems that allow room for your creativity, and the acquisition, analysis, and interpretation of results. Typically, the project you work with will have multiple possible solutions or conclusions and sufficient complexity to require a degree of project planning.
